overview:
Gene Hammett has been successful in many roles in life. Currently, Gene Hammett works a Business Coach for Core Elevation. If your revenues and profits are “flat”, you might be in need of finding NEW RESULTS. Visit www.CoreElevation.com to download free tips to GROW you business.

To get to here, Gene graduated from Georgia Tech in 1992 with a Bachelors degree in Industrial Engineering. After seven years of strategy and IT consulting, Gene worked in the dot com craze with an eCommerce company. Gene also started his own company and managed it successful in the area of event marketing.

Gene Hammett has continued his personal development recently by becoming certified as an Business Coach with a focus to serving small business owners and entrepreneurs. His primary goal is to inspire people to grow their business.
